div.p: Grace from God the Father and our Lord Jesus Christ, and I wish you, my revered father in the Lord, and all yours a happy new year from the bottom of my heart. Next, you should know that I received your letter with the silver gift, for which I thank you very much. I carefully keep the gifts you sent me, and I want to preserve them in memory of your paternal benevolence throughout my life. Thirdly, I will also ensure that, according to your admonition, I fear God and obey my father and mother and study diligently. May God grant me His grace.
I commend myself to you and ask that you pray to God for me; I will also diligently pray for you. Farewell, dearest father in Christ.
My parents and brothers greet you.
Johann Heinrich Musculus, your obedient son in Christ. To the most learned man, Lord Heinrich Bullinger, my dearest and always revered father in Christ. Zurich.
